thread.title: Demi Lovato Seems Amused by Fan Who Asks Her to Sign Nude Photo
thread.title_full: Demi Lovato Seems Amused by Fan Who Asks Her to Sign Nude Photo

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Demi Lovato Seems Amused by Fan Who Asks Her to Sign Nude Photo
text:
Comments When exiting the 'SNL' after party, Demi was approached by a male fan who asked her to sign a copy of a nude photo from the Vanity Fair spread. 
Demi Lovato looked amused by a male fan who asked her to sign a nude photo of her as she exited the " Saturday Night Live " after party on early Sunday, October 18. The "Cool for the Summer" hitmaker smiled widely while the fan presented the photo to her but she refused to sign it. Demi was accompanied by a male security guard when leaving the Heartland Brewery in New York. The "Heart Attack" songstress donned a cleavage-baring black jumpsuit paired with a navy long coat. She completed her look with a black clutch and pointy high heels. Tracy Morgan , who hosted the "SNL" that night, also attended the after party with his wife Megan Wollover. Other celebrities in attendance included Nick Jonas , Joe Jonas and Gigi Hadid . Tracy wore a black tee paired with a blue jacket and black trousers. Nick entered the venue solo wearing a black hat, a khaki jacket, black pants and white sneakers. Joe and Gigi, meanwhile, rocked matching black-and-white outfits. During the "SNL", Demi sang a medley of the title track from her " Confident " album and "Cool for the Summer" before later performing "Stone Cold".
